```{r}
# Диапазон дат, когда проводились онлайн занятия

First_day <- "09/11/2020"
Last_day <- "31/12/2020"

holydays <- c("04/11/2020",
              "31/12/2020", 
              "01/01/2021", 
              "02/01/2021", 
              "03/01/2021", 
              "04/01/2021", 
              "05/01/2021", 
              "06/01/2021", 
              "07/01/2021", 
              "08/01/2021",
              "23/02/2021", 
              "08/03/2021", 
              "01/05/2021", 
              "09/05/2021",
              "10/05/2021",
              "12/06/2021")



First_day <-strptime(First_day, format = "%d/%m/%Y")
Last_day <- strptime(Last_day, format = "%d/%m/%Y")

all_days <- data.frame(Date = seq(as.Date(First_day), as.Date(Last_day), by="days"))
all_days$Week_day = weekdays(all_days$Date)
all_days$Month <- months(all_days$Date)

all_days <- all_days[!(all_days$Date %in% as.Date(holydays)), ] # удаляем праздники

all_days$Date <- strptime(all_days$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")


```




# **Календарно-тематическое содержание дистанционных занятий 2020-2021 учебного года**

```{r}
# Чтение ктп

ktp <- read_excel("data/ktp_2020_2021.xlsx")
ktp$Date <- strptime(ktp$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")

ktp_distant <- ktp %>% filter(Date %in% all_days$Date )


```
